headquarters.name: Headquarters
headquarters.desc: The bigger your headquarter is, the bigger the parties are, and the faster the expansion of your Empire will be.
headquarters.feature: Reduce the upgrade time for buildings

training_facility.name: Training Facility
training_facility.desc: All the recruitment process will happen in this Building. The bigger the Training Facility will be, the more noises it will make and the Units will apply faster.
training_facility.feature: Reduce the recruitment time for units

operation_center.name: Operation Center
operation_center.desc: This is where all the strategies about your production Empire are being discussed. If those are going smoothly it should impact your production in a good way.
operation_center.feature: +0.5% Income per Level (Does not work on the daily prize)

pantheon.name: Pantheon
pantheon.desc: Either you are feared as a wealthy Drug God or laughed at as a mere Nobody.

research_center.name: Research Center
research_center.desc: The Research Center allows the training of your units in new techniques. As with the HQ, higher is the level, faster the skills are developed.
research_center.feature: Decrease the time required to learn new trainings

crackhouse.name: Crack House
crackhouse.desc: No tattletale will see the upcoming Empire through the cracks. You can produce drugs without fear and at your own pace.

hydrofarm.name: Hydroponic Farm
hydrofarm.desc: Transform an abandoned building into a farm and produce more Drugs while saving on water and energy.

meth_lab.name: Meth Lab
meth_lab.desc: This building is all White and it’s your way to honor the Crystal Meth King by producing more and more Drugs at a comfortable speed.

cocina.name: Cocina
cocina.desc: Add some salt, spices, sour, sugar to your Drugs and it will be produced at a “Yes, Chef” speed.

pharma_lab.name: Pharmaceutical Lab
pharma_lab.desc: You’ve learnt from your trip to Cali how to be illegal in a legal way. You know from the Drug Kings how to produce massively while keeping low profile.

drug_storage.name: Drug Storage
drug_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more DRUGS and keep them safe from enemies.
drug_storage.feature: Keep safe 25% of your drug storage capacity

ammunition.name: Ammunition Factory
ammunition.desc: This is the Ammunition shop that you’ve stolen and transformed into a factory to start a small weapon production.

weapon_factory.name: Weapon Factory
weapon_factory.desc: No more only Ammunitions, it’s time to get to a bigger league by producing more weapons in your factory.

smuggle.name: Smuggle
smuggle.desc: Start your weapon business by smuggling them all over the place.

blackmarket.name: Black Market
blackmarket.desc: This market is a way for you to expand your business and to trade your stuff for even more weapons. Buyers and resellers can’t bargain with you.

metalprint.name: 3D Metal printing
metalprint.desc: You are not like any other Drug Lords, you are always after new technology and you know this is the revolution to build weapons at a light speed in your backyard.

weapon_storage.name: Weapon Storage
weapon_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more WEAPONS and keep them safe from enemies.
weapon_storage.feature: Keep safe 25% of your weapon storage capacity

t_distillery.name: Traditional Distillery
t_distillery.desc: This building is the start of your homemade alcohol production.

bar.name: Bar
bar.desc: The best way to live in an addiction denial is to own a bar and to surround yourself with more alcohol. Cut it with some water for the customers.

brewery.name: Brewery
brewery.desc: According to chemistry, alcohol is a solution, then the Brewery is producing more solutions at a good pace.

castle.name: Castle
castle.desc: Use the 80 rooms of this castle to produce more alcohol by transforming the grape into wine. You may find some hidden gems in its cave as well.

industrial_distillery.name: Industrial Distillery
industrial_distillery.desc: The ultimate way to produce alcohol that could fill your water fountain, your bathtub, your swimming pool and your pond in a blink of an eye.

alcohol_storage.name: Alcohol Silo
alcohol_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more ALCOHOL and keep them safe from enemies.
alcohol_storage.feature: Keep safe 25% of your alcohol storage capacity

camera.name: Cameras
camera.desc: The more cameras you have means you can spy on your neighboors more and catch any suspects move.
camera.feature: GIVE MORE INFORMATIONS ABOUT AN UPCOMING OPPONENT

defense_troop.name: Defense Troops
defense_troop.desc: A good defense which consist of having strong defenders.
defense_troop.feature: REDUCE THE DAMAGE TAKEN BY YOUR BUILDINGS

defense_system.name: Security System
defense_system.desc: This is a sophisticated system to defend yourself
defense_system.feature: INCREASED DAMAGE AGAINST LONG RANGE UNITS

hidden_mines.name: Hidden Mines
hidden_mines.desc: Put some mines around your base and suprise your opponents!
